input: New rainbow spinning kaleidoscope. Brightly colored bouncing ball design attracts infants' attention, increases visual nerve development, and trains color recognition. The colorful ball rotates when pressed to enhance baby's attention, visual adjustment and hand-eye coordination.

The little turtle is an audio-visual learning turtle. Press the buttons on the shell of the turtle to make the turtle crawl forward, allowing infants and toddlers to move along with the turtle. Press the letter and number buttons to learn letters, numbers and shapes.

Baby Stacking Tower . Babies and toddlers shake, stack and roll the blocks to train finger grip, hearing and vision. Different textures on the surface of the blocks increase the tactile sensation when baby touches them.

Dog Songs Audiobook . A picture book for learning language, colors, and numbers with 6 songs. Turn the pages and be mesmerized by the songs and fun discoveries. Happy music every time you open the page for the first language! Learn your first language with your ears and eyes!
Little Turtle Building Block Box. The cute little turtle and 10 colorful blocks are easy for children to grip and mix and match, allowing them to be creative on their own.

Board Book - Wildlife Chapter . It's never too early to start reading. A special book made of wooden boards that introduces babies and toddlers to the wonderful world of wildlife through bright and colorful illustrations.

Colorful soft building blocks. It allows infants to pinch, stack, grab, and train the strength of little fingers, and it is safe to put it into the mouth and bite it during the mouthing period, and the colorful colors can stimulate the vision.

Loyal Multi-Purpose Puzzle Box . There are 20 ways to play and inspire 35 kinds of intellectual education. Colorful games cultivate baby's visual, auditory and tactile development, practice baby's hand-eye coordination and concentration, and enhance baby's logical thinking.
Cute caterpillar building blocks. Different colors and shapes, free to assemble, easy to grip. Enhances hand-eye coordination, develops fine motor skills and dexterity.

Spinning Tumbler. Designed with different patterns, such as dots, lines, swirls, etc.; the bottle also has a variety of tactile sensations, such as bumpy, matte and smooth, which provides rich visual, auditory and tactile sensory experiences and enhances hand-eye coordination.
Dazzle Light Radio . Keep baby and toddler entertained with music and funky light shows anywhere! The soothing teether swivel and a textured buckle also allows for safe hanging anywhere!
The Sweet Star Music Bell. Cute, rounded shape with a clear sound. The gentle pastel colors are very appealing to babies and toddlers. Can be hung from a crib, stroller or rocking chair.

Rainbow sound and light musical bell. Soft gradient light helps to soothe and calm baby. Soft sound effects will make baby feel more secure. Lightweight and portable, soothes and calms baby at all times.
Baby projector. 6 soft melodies with womb sounds and 3 nature sounds, switch between light projection and night light mode each time you press the button.

Clouds are floating. Smiley face soft plush on the front, smooth and colorful prints on the back, colorful striped ribbon labels and detailed decorations, a variety of fabric combinations to increase baby's gripping experience and reduce tactile defenses, irregular contours to make every grip a different feeling.

Magic Touch Piano. Wooden toy magically plays music, compact and portable, allowing infants to have fun anytime, anywhere. 2 modes of play for infants to explore, promoting the development of vision and hearing.

Chubby ball. The sound of the bell attracts baby's attention and stimulates the sense of hearing. Different fabrics to stimulate, increase the sense of touch, but also can be hooked trolley, car seat, bedside!

Willy's Little Helmsman . Solid teeth ring particle protrusion, hand small muscle tactile stimulation, size suitable for baby to grasp, carry. Helps infants develop hand-eye coordination, explore and help sensory development at the same time.

Folding play board. Features four double-sided pages, each with a different sensory exploration activity for babies and toddlers to experience. Features high-contrast black and white graphics, colorful animal companions and fun exploration activities.
Fisher-Price Power Rack. 5 detachable toys to enrich five senses development. 3 ways to play, baby can play since birth. High contrasting colors for visual development
Sonic Animal Pendant (Elephant). The dangling toy can inspire sight tracking in infancy, and there are two different tactile grasps underneath to develop infants' sensory stimulation.
Soft cube rattle. With easy note sheet music, let your child become a little musician! Introduce your child to the wonders of music. You can also use the stick to play with the ferrocement on top!

Sensory Cubes - A Day at the Farm. Diversified interactive design: animal calls, rattles, baby safety mirror, elastic cord, ribbons, plush touch, patchwork of different fabrics. Visual, auditory and tactile explorations for sensory and cognitive development.

Hand shaking egg-shaped toys. Three pieces in a group, each animal will make different sounds when shaken by hand, with colorful and Q version of the design, so that infants have a different visual experience!

Sandy Shaker. Medium size, suitable for infants and young children's hands, hand shake to help enhance the sensory skills of infants and young children and motor skills, colorful beads and make crunching sounds, prompting the development of visual and auditory

The ocean is far away. It consists of three cute and colorful animals. Rattles make unique sounds when vibrated. Suction cups hold the toy in place on smooth surfaces and prevent it from tipping over. Professionally designed to fit snugly in little hands.

Animal Fitness Frame . Warm wooden color scheme with elephants and camels on it stimulates baby's five senses and promotes growth. Swaying toys are eye-catching, training to reach out and stimulate fine motor movements.

Planet Fitness Stand . Warm wooden color scheme with planets and rockets hanging from it, stimulates baby's five senses and promotes growth Toys that wiggle and sway make a big difference, training to reach out and stimulate fine motor movements

Dance Balls. Four different sizes, materials and shapes of sensory balls, emitting different sounds, softness and hardness, allowing little hands to squeeze and knead to promote the development of small muscles and stimulate the development of touch and hearing!

Rocking Magic Mirror. Colorful orbs and shapes move to provide visual stimulation, rolling bells and collision sounds to stimulate the sense of hearing, cultivate spatial sense and sense of direction to establish, mirror imaging allows children to self-awareness

Label Cloth Book - Cool Little Series . Colorful ribbon labels and cool grey color collaboration with unexpected healing effect, bring a smile to the 8-page short story, combined with baby's favorite sandpaper and ribbon labels, can attract baby's attention!

Labeling cloth book - Pippi Puppy. Pippi Puppy's mischievous and realistic smile and serious eyes are the characteristics of Pippi Puppy. The 8-page story that brings a smile to the face of babies and toddlers combines the favorite sandpaper and ribbon tags to attract babies and toddlers' attention.

Paradise Galaxy - Hanging Dolls. Four different sizes and shapes of patterns, different sounds, softness and hardness, allowing little hands to squeeze and knead to promote the development of small muscles and stimulate the development of touch and hearing.
Otter Teether. Rings for little hands to grip, shake and twist for sensory play. The sound of the beads encourages continuous training.
Sophie's Educational Teether. Allows little hands to grip, shake, pluck and rotate easily, allowing baby to engage in different sensory play.

Rotating ball suction cups. Brightly colored circles create a visually stimulating experience when spinning. Inside ball and rings spin in opposite directions to enhance baby's attention. Helps promote hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills.

2-in-1 Intellectual Fitness Frame. When lying down, there are natural hand movements by touching various hanging decorations, removing the decorations to finish rattling play, and simple finger movements such as gripping, pinching and picking up. There are 3 types of hand movement games to stimulate children's fingertip development when sitting or standing.

Cute airplane suction cups. The base of the airplane has a suction cup design, can be directly attached to the flat surface, at home or out of the dining out of the small plane to accompany the baby and young children at home. 360 degree rotating wings and propellers, double side movable stars, attract baby's attention.
Tactile Teethers. Babies can harden their teeth by scraping the silicone part. Developing "tactile" sense with different "patterns" helps to develop baby's senses.
Wave drum teethers. Allows little hands to easily grasp and shake, allowing baby to engage in different sensory play. Sounds encourage continuous training.
Cell phone teethers. Combines rattles, mirrors and teethers to help infants and toddlers enhance fine finger movements and tactile sensory stimulation.

Happy Ocean World. Unique ocean scenes and animals, with underwater lighting effects and wave sounds, gradually weakening sounds and lights, effectively attracting babies and soothing baby's emotions, with a remote control to adjust the switch and volume.
Sensory touch ball. Bright colors, each one is different, more attractive to babies and toddlers. It can train grasping ability and tactile sense, and promote the development of the brain.
Baby elephant soothing doll. There are three modes can be switched, press the stomach, vibration will be music, can stimulate the baby's hearing, soft touch can stimulate the baby's sense of touch!

Peek-a-boo Baby Mobile . Fun role-play phone where baby learns numbers, colors and fun phrases. Press the learn button to develop baby's fine motor skills. Turn the bear's head to reveal a hidden mirror to play hide and seek with baby!

Clockwork Learning Robot . The robot has four different modes of operation to experience and work on motor strength and hand-eye coordination for infants and toddlers. Learn counting and colors through songs. Enhances fine motor skills of infants and toddlers.

3 transparent bagels filled with colorful beads that rustle when shaken, and 2 delicious sesame seed bagels with small bumps on the surface to help stimulate little hands. Learn about color and sorting and small muscle development.

Tissue Paper Twister . Adorable tissue box toy, filled with different colors, patterns and textures of "tissue paper", is a comfortable sensory toy that nurtures fine motor and visual development of infants and toddlers!

Fun Activity Cubes . The Activity Cube allows infants and toddlers to repeatedly take out and put in fabric tissue paper from the Activity Cube and have endless fun. Five sides with different play sets for infants to explore!

The penguin is a penguin that can be pushed over and back to its original position. Push down and back to the original position, in this back and forth action, can let infants and young children repeated learning, cultivate the basis of concentration!
Rockstar. Four different drum sounds for babies and toddlers to bang out or play along with the built-in music to create different variations and learn about the animals above!

Soft building blocks. Soft silicone material, no matter for infants and young children hand pinch, mouth to bite are also safe, each square has a different design, small square with the same number of animals and graphics

Poke and Go. The delicate butterfly design features 6 vibrant silicone bubbles built into the plastic frame. 6 colors appeal to the senses and the repetitive beeping sound encourages fine motor skills and sensory exploration.

Rainbow Labyrinth. 3 colorful arches with different shapes of colorful beads slide back and forth to train infants' fine finger movements, and the double-sided sun can make the clicking sound more interesting when rotating.
Activity organizer. Functions such as pushing buttons and making sounds promote eye and hand coordination and "cause and effect" learning through repeated play.
Learning Cube. The Learning Cube has 5 interactive surfaces to encourage discovery and exploration, and 4 light-up buttons that introduce animal names, sounds and shapes to develop fine motor skills.

My First Stacking Cube. There are 6 sides to play with and each side is a unique exercise in fine hand movements, with different textures, colors and sounds to stimulate baby's senses and reinforce repetitive motives.

Sunshine Rainbow Ball . The ball has a double-sided pattern with sweet sunshine on one side and rainbow clouds on the other. It can be used for sitting and crawling play. Colorful rattle beads inside for visual development and fine motor training for little hands.

Tactile Cubes. Stimulate infants' senses with cloth, wood and other tactile stimulation. Stimulate infants' five senses while turning the cloth, stacking blocks and playing to promote infants' development.

Rockin' Beanies (Purple). Baby's little hands keep spinning, making the beanies jump and the eyes beat along with the rhythm! Train baby's little hand muscles, and also help baby's visual tracking and auditory development!

Twist the crocodile. Let the crocodile twist and turn for a pleasant ticking sound! Twisting the crocodile's body stimulates the senses and promotes the development of little fingertips. Three different tactile sensations to develop baby's touch development.

Owl tumbler. A variety of sound and light melodies to attract the attention of infants and young children, light effects to stimulate the visual senses, a combination of materials to provide infants and young children with different tactile experience.

Hedgehog Accordion . The slender handle is easy for babies and toddlers to hold in their small hands. When pulling the handle, the accordion will emit various sounds to promote the infant's auditory stimulation, and during the pulling process, it can help the fine movement of the little hand.

Sound and light key trolley . Joyful music soothing bell for infants and toddlers, so that infants and toddlers through color, music, touch, to achieve sensory and tactile stimulation, to promote the development of small muscles, shaking the car, you can hear the car's exclusive sound!
Animal Crawling Toy Car. The soft, rounded belly is easy for babies and toddlers to grip and roll, press the rounded, soft belly of the little animals to push them into a crazy little animal race!

Elephant Keyboard Piano . Twist the elephant trunk, turn the ball, pull the flower, turn the page, press the keys and pull the beads, and twist the knobs. It is a manual action training game to exercise small hands and develop motor skills for better finger dexterity!

Eco-friendly rainbow hoops. Bright and colorful circles are easy for infants to grip, helping visual, tactile and small hand muscle development, and developing problem solving skills through sorting and stacking games.

Sensory Animal Twister. Colorful color scheme, material and design with clicking sound effect, stimulate baby's sensory development and improve baby's attention. Multi-directional wraparound, lightweight and easy to hold, promotes baby's hand muscle development.

Au嗚choir. Infants and toddlers make their hands move, colorful beads climb upwards, training baby's visual tracking. The owls stand in line and jump into the tunnel to sing together! Infants can try color and shape matching.

Peek-a-boo laptop dog . Light-up crayon buttons play color phrases and songs. Infants and toddlers can learn shapes, numbers, colors, music, phrases and more. Cover your eyes and say cute peek-a-boo phrases!

Cute sound pineapple. Contains 4 accessories - watermelon, sun, flamingo and coconut tree. When you put the accessories into the pineapple, there will be light, sound and music to encourage babies and toddlers to train their little hand muscles and learn cognition at the same time.

ABC Cube Party Cloth Building Blocks. A variety of delicate cloth fabrics and patterns, hidden inside the three-dimensional geometric totem columns to provide tactile and auditory stimulation, independent exploration, can be set, stacking, grasping, gripping, kneading and kneading training for infants and young children's hands fine motor skills.

Baby Bonanza. The doughnut shaped Boonazi can be attached to each other one after another, or create a variety of curved shapes like a small spring, which doubles the play and fun. Three different texture designs provide a variety of tactile sensations when gripping.

Polaroid Tactile System Ball Set. Grasp, hold, push, pull, dig, touch and keying to explore the sense of touch, 6 strange-looking large and small balls, touch, material, softness and hardness are not the same, different touch can stimulate the finger peripheral nerves, to help the tactile exploration!

Stacking Elephant. Let babies and toddlers learn to stack colorful and special textured circles and improve listening and observation skills. Press the tail of the elephant and the elephant will sneeze to make the circles pop out, training babies and toddlers' fine hand movements.

Rock and roll electronic music drum. As the snare drum rolls along, accompanied by dynamic music and light effects, baby will get high too. Use your hands to tap the two color-coded areas of the drum to create a variety of rhythms and rhymes.

Three sides of the game music roller . Each of the three sides has a different function: safety mirror, twisting music, and plectrum. With a nice music box sound, horizontal and vertical play, rolling to encourage infants to crawl.

Baby music play ball. Mild music, soothes baby's emotions. Helps crawling and hand grasping ability, training small muscle growth, brain movement, help to build three-dimensional concepts and visual cognition. Crawling is an important postural reflex, which helps the development of small and large muscles of the whole body.

Colorful sound and light rolling ball. A ball toy that rolls on its own, with colorful and shiny buttons that attract babies and toddlers to press it, and responds with lights and musical sounds. Develops baby's overall motor skills and makes baby's body movements more flexible.
Octopus Lara. Multi-tactile feedback to increase the flexibility of small hands, convex shape pull handle, pulling more feeling, double-sided pressure Q elastic bubble, stimulate finger training

Hole Racer. Soft finger hole design allows baby's little hands to easily grasp and strengthen the use of hand power, when moving forward, the sand ball will be rotating with the wheel to make interesting sounds, attracting baby's interest in playing, repeated practice to enhance concentration and hand-eye coordination ability!

Beads spinning Ferris wheel. Colorful design, with suction cups for fixing, and a mirror on the back for babies and toddlers to recognize their own faces. The small beads will roll when rotating, which can train your little one's visual tracking.
Luminescent Stacking Fun. Each circle is different in size and touch, allowing infants to experience the sensation of grasping, with lights to stimulate infants' visual and tactile sensations.

Sky shaped drop box. Repeatedly extracted and reused to stimulate baby's curiosity to explore and train baby's muscle flexibility. Matching with the same shape in the hole can enhance baby's ability to recognize three-dimensional shapes and recognize colors.

Happy spinning Ferris wheel. When infants press the animal, the Ferris wheel will say the English word of the animal, the animal's call and happy song, and will ask questions interactively with infants and toddlers. It allows babies and toddlers to practice their hand muscles and auditory language learning.

Colorful rice animal blocks. Various shapes of blocks are lightweight and easy to grab, and the raw material is made of Japanese rice which is safe to bite and lick, and can be knocked, thrown, arranged and stacked to repeatedly cultivate baby's patience, concentration and imagination.

Sound effect finger fun game machine. A collection of lifestyle products that babies and toddlers love to play with, rich in sound effects and finger training gameplay, deeply attracting babies and toddlers' attention, and at the same time, greatly assisting the development of hearing, touch and other senses!
Flip the starter rack. Bright colors to attract baby's attention, dozens of fun games to attract baby to grasp, pinch, push, and train small hand muscle strength.

Six-sided musical discovery box . It is an interactive activity center that stimulates children's imagination and creativity. Dozens of different games to enhance motor skills of infants and toddlers through various elements such as pushing, pulling, grasping and spinning.

Puzzle game machine. A small one combines 13 life games that babies and toddlers love to play, and the small parts of the machine are strung on a rope, so they won't be lost and can be played again and again. Satisfying children's natural needs is the best intellectual development. Full of sound and light effects, full of fun!

Brain Stimulating Remote Control . Ultra-realistic toy with hand-shaped grooves, easy to hold, with 5 types of 16 brain-stimulating buttons, up to 40 kinds of sound effects & melodies. Pressing the big buttons will light up, and there are different touch sensations to stimulate brain and finger development!

Farm Fun Storybook . Five colorful illustrated pages with easy-to-grip tabs. Press the glossy buttons to hear the funny sounds on each page or press the music button to play 15 different classic melodies.

Toot-Toot Car Life Flip Book - Cars . Learn about a wonderful day in the life of a Toot-Toot car with fun phrases, songs, and realistic sound effects. Comes with easy-to-grip tabs for fine motor training of small hands and bright colors to attract attention.

Tuk Tuk Life Flip Book - Fire . Learn about an exciting day in the life of a Toot-Toot Fire Engine through a lively story. Fun phrases, songs and realistic sound effects help promote language and cognitive skills.
Sonic Tactile Ball . Soft, sturdy grippable ball with waves, inclines and curves for infants to explore. Rolling or shaking with a bell sound attracts baby's attention.

Children's Smart Watch. An educational toy for "five senses stimulation" and "dialog". At the push of a button, it sings "Hello" and "Goodbye" greeting songs in Japanese and English. Turn the dial or shake it to make sounds.

Fisher-Price Baby Building Block Box. There are various shapes of cubic blocks, matching into the same shape of the hole, can enhance the ability of infants to recognize three-dimensional shapes, but also to understand the color!

Emotional hand shaking sound toys. Let babies and toddlers learn to spin. Interactive educational toys that stimulate hand-eye coordination for infants to learn colors, shapes, touch, and emotions, along with different music combinations.
Suction cup tactile set. Three bright shapes for baby's hands to explore, watch as baby pulls, shakes and pushes to combine tactile, auditory and visual learning.

Animal modeling stacking fun. Animal stacking toys can develop little baby's problem solving skills, the elephant's head can be turned left and right, the lion's mane can be turned in a circle, the monkey's cheeky smiley face is also turning left and right to say hello to little baby!

Fun Musical Cookie Jar. Babies will be rewarded with fun sound effects as they sort four types of cookies into shapes. Helps develop baby's sorting skills and teaches colors, numbers, shapes and more!
Let's Hide and Seek. Peek-a-boo animals pop up when infants press or turn the four buttons to play! Promotes finger development, hand-eye interlock, and problem-solving skills.

Multi-functional learning pizza . Press the buttons of different ingredients on the pizza, it will make different sounds to attract baby's attention while learning colors, shapes and positions. Turn the bottom half of the pizza to learn counting with music.

Cute Animal Building Block Box . A series of fun hand training activities for babies and toddlers to learn about interactive learning and improve their motor development. Use common telephone sets and cute butterfly books with words, colors and English.

Sound and light interactive camping light. Designed for little campers, the interactive camping light flashes different lights to stimulate baby's senses, learning numbers, letters of the alphabet, locations and animal sounds through music and movie language teaching, learning through play!
Cute Moose. Learn to count, recognize colors, and sing along with your toddler. Just press the button on the moose's tummy and the party begins!

Rainbow Dream Piano. Two interactive games to introduce infants to numbers and colors. Tones can be changed to different instruments or special sound effects can be displayed when playing. Exercises large and small muscles and trains hand manipulation.

Fun geometric knock-knock music. Bright colorful design enhances infants' awareness of colors and shapes. The blocks correspond to the same position, or use the mallet to knock the blocks into the toy box, increasing the development of small hand muscles.

Happy Little Monkey Taps the Drum . When infants and toddlers tap the drum, the little monkey will swing his hands and play various drum sounds, which can recognize animals and animal sounds. Helps infants and toddlers to enhance motor skills, develop language skills and knowledge acquisition.

Cute Dinosaur Train. As the train moves, the first Triceratops keeps the colorful beads bouncing, the second Tyrannosaurus Rex's head bounces back and forth, and the third Thunder Dragon's head rotates 360 degrees. Babies and toddlers can separate them for fine hand movement training!

Multi-sensory set. Nine different tactile effects to stimulate baby's senses of sound and touch. Each piece can be disassembled and assembled freely to train little hands' muscle strength and grasping skills.

Interactive learning radio. Versatile switch design to train little fingers' muscle coordination. More than 75 music and sound effects, so there's no need to be monotonous. Creates a unique stage of play as the age of the infant changes.

Educational and fun stacking cups. There are five different sizes of stacking cups and five easy-to-grasp blocks in bright colors to stimulate visual development. Trains concentration and hand-eye coordination.

Fun Stone Stacking. It consists of five stones of different sizes, shapes and colors. You can stack them from big to small or arrange them according to colors to learn the concept of size and color. Develop hand-eye coordination through the interactive process.

Sound and light interactive tailless bear. Rotate the gears and press the numbers on the tree trunk, there will be a wonderful musical accompaniment to play with infants and toddlers, multiple mechanisms to stimulate the development of the senses. Soft ear design soothes baby's emotions.
Fisher Price Snail House . Let's move at our own pace like a snail! Ten tricks on five surfaces, including blocks and buttons, promote finger development and fine motor skills for infants!

2-in-1 Alphabet Stacking Cup. Six different colors and sizes of cups for infants to learn to stack in order, training logic and hand-eye coordination, 4 colorful balls and puzzle base, colorful design can stimulate infants' vision, logic and hand-eye coordination.
Magic touch DJ turntable. Various sounds and melodies allow children to do brush mixing effects like a real DJ, training the hearing and vision of infants and young children.
Flying Saucer. Upright way to let the middle gears slide from top to bottom, and then upside down again, the repetitive action, so that infants and young children to produce the visual attention!

Move your little fingers. Introducing small actions in life into the toy, with grasping, rattling, turning, turning, closing, pulling, sliding, embedding and double-handed play, stimulating the eyes, brain and hands of infants and young children's small games

6 shapes of blocks, you need to adjust your hand movement according to the shapes when picking up and dropping off the blocks; the top of the blocks are designed with different textures to provide more tactile variations when gripping. Two sizes of throwing nets are interwoven to increase the challenge of picking up and dropping the blocks.
Fish Adventure Toys. Three sound and light modes, six press and rebound, promote infants' vision, touch, hearing and small finger muscle development.

Game Controller. With 2 learning modes and various games with fun sound effects, you can learn to recognize English, shapes, colors and numbers in the exciting and lively music, and learn invisibly while having fun!

Color Rolling Color Car . Provides fun guided pretend play to improve early color and counting skills, with each ball exploring color names and color mixing to hone developing hand-eye coordination skills!

Roman Castle. Roman Castle helps babies and toddlers stimulate their sense of touch. Each soft building block has a letter of the alphabet and corresponding animal carvings, and the process of stacking the castle establishes a sense of space and an understanding of shapes and forms. Squeezing and kneading will also make sound to stimulate infants' sense of hearing.

Jing Qi Paradise. Using different shapes of elephants, owls and fishes in different tummy geometries to play matching games to cultivate infants' shape cognition and hand-eye coordination. Allow hands, eyes and brain to work simultaneously to promote the sensitivity of thinking and responsiveness.

Musical Rainbow Tea Set. The teapot lid opens with a greeting, the pot glows, there are two cups for babies and toddlers to learn how to share, and the cake set has different colors and fruits for learning.

Multi-shape matching gears. A total of 6 geometric shapes for infants and toddlers in the game will learn to identify, according to the color matching, so that infants and toddlers to understand the multiple colors, bright colors to stimulate visual development, you can give play to creativity, any twisting gears exercise!

Sweet Manners Tea Set . The Smart Learning Sweet Manners Tea Set features over 30 sound effects and cheerful tunes that allow children to learn English, numbers, colors, and shapes in a fun, family-friendly way! Simulate and practice manners from the invisible!

Play house wine picnic set. Shaped grooves allow baby to practice matching games and fine hand movements. Press the butterfly button to hear which treats or blocks the picnic basket wants to eat and fun music. Can also enhance manners and human interaction.

Little Chef Cooking Pot. The cute pot shape and colorful ingredients and gadgets allow children to immerse themselves in the cooking process. Ingredients can be split into two and put into the pot with fun sound effects and counting phrases. Stimulates children's creative and imaginative potential.

Double layer birthday cake. Provide children with role play fun, accessories to enhance the playability and increase parent-child interaction, gently press the chocolate button to light up the candles and sing happy birthday songs, make a wish and blow out the candles with cheers and applause to celebrate the birthday, the candles will go out yo!

Cute Little Monster. Cute little monster shape, as long as the baby walks together, the head will follow the turn, change the expression pattern, in the baby learning to walk at the same time not alone!

Wobbler. Is a new ramp toy that rolls and swings the colorful ball while the base of the ramp swings. Allows infants and toddlers to develop visual and fine motor skills. Helps stimulate the development of all five senses.

Dynamic Knock Knock Caterpillar. The Caterpillar is equipped with eight colorful keys, so baby can create music by pressing the keys with her hands or hitting the keys with the piano stick. Enhances hand-eye coordination and cognitive development.

Numbers Learning Giraffe Set . The giraffe base is on wheels so the giraffe can be pushed around and played with, bouncing up and down as it walks. Learning numbers while playing, 30 basic and number blocks for infants to recognize 0~9.

Turtle Throwing Fun. Throw the colorful balls into the holes to stimulate children's sense of touch and hand muscle development, hand-eye coordination; press the orange button, all the doors will open at the same time, and the colorful balls will be released in a surprise!

Dinosaur puzzle. Place the animal blocks into the corresponding grooves to train your little hands to develop fine motor skills and learn shapes. Place the columns on the back of the baby dinosaur to maintain balance and keep it from shaking. Arrange the columns from big to small to learn the concept of size and stacking.

Baby Smart Spinning Fun. Rich component design, start the baby's sensory world, colorful, full of energy and vitality, let the baby's imagination more exciting. There are bead maze, cognitive matching learning, spinning gears, spinning screws, mirror, rain rattle, and more.

Color recognition with toucans. Using colorful birds to guide infants and toddlers' hands to explore color, shape and size recognition. Increase the ability to recognize colors in the same color family, sort sizes to form the ability to perceive size, and help infants develop hand-eye coordination.

Animal March . Toddlers can play for a long time with round, triangular, square, trapezoidal and other shapes of beads in their hands; move the animals to play games or create stories with beads and animals!
Stimulates all five senses. 4 interactive modes of play are available, each with lights, music and fun activities. Trains physical activity

Hammer Ball Percussion. Mace ball combined with music design, the ball falls down and strikes the piano piece, making a beautiful melody and attracting children's attention. It can train hand-eye coordination, cognitive ability, creativity, and hearing.

Echo Microphone. By placing your mouth close to the center of the microphone and aiming at the sound hole, the cups in the sound chamber will vibrate and amplify the sound to produce a more dynamic and three-dimensional sound.

Multi-faceted sound and light building block box. Through the drop blocks, you can learn shapes, transportation, animals, and with the sound and light interactions that babies and toddlers love, you can learn fine hand movements and visual and auditory stimulation.

Educational Galaxy Toys. The beads look like beautiful planets such as Earth and Mars, and roll freely in the whirlpool, which can train infants and young children to visualize and auditory stimulation.
Caterpillar modeling toys for toddlers. Unique morphing structure, create various shapes, cultivate baby's perception of shape, touch, color, and enhance baby's fine motor skills.

Elephant and Friends. Bright colors stimulate baby's mind, and the puzzle can be used in two ways: by placing the animals in corresponding grooves on the board to complete the puzzle, or by stacking them on top of each other for practicing fine hand movements!

Fisher-Price Cute Phones. Brightly colored shaped phone for role play to develop imagination. Develops physical skills to recognize numbers. Can be used to increase verbal interaction with babies and toddlers.

2 in 1 hitting game. 2 knocking methods, enjoy the fun of knocking. Train baby's finger fine manipulation/eye-hand coordination/observation. Colorful shapes to attract attention and eye color Focus, through the safe and fun operation can train the use of small finger muscles.

Cake Cutting Fun . Your child's favorite birthday cake! Insert candles, lollipops and cute decorations to improve hand-eye coordination. The sides of the cake are glued with devil's felt to increase the resistance of the knife to cut down and improve the operation of tools and hand strength. Encourage children to share generously with friends and relatives, and practice forming a complete circle.

Xylophone trolley. Through knocking and generating music to satisfy the child's curiosity, bring the child a preliminary understanding of the wonders of music, music to carry away, lively and interesting. The perfect design of the percussion stick is stored and hidden in the body of the instrument.
The 26 letters of the English alphabet plus animal words and sound effects allow babies and young children to learn to speak easily and learn the sounds of various animals!

The sound and light learning mini truck. The little truck can be pulled around to train the coordination and balance of infants and toddlers. Guide to put different shaped blocks into the corresponding holes to train finger dexterity. Learn numbers, colors and shapes anytime, anywhere!
C-shaped chain set. Rich colors for learning color recognition, groove design for easy grip, free splicing training for infants to train finger strength and hand-eye coordination.

Educational fun hole ball toys . Soft material hole ball toys, lightweight and easy to hold, bite and lick at ease, with 8 kinds of small toys, can be detached separately to play, there are daily necessities, switches and keys, etc., to promote finger dexterity, full stimulation of brain development!

Zipper fun game. The realistic zipper idea is added into the toy, there are different styles of zippers and beads, which help baby to grasp, pull, twist, pinch and so on to train the flexibility of thumb and forefinger, and stimulate brain development.

Shape Matching Fun. Each of the six sides has different shapes of corded blocks with colorful colors, allowing infants and toddlers to match them correctly, training the development of small hand muscles, increasing fine motor skills, and stimulating brain development.

Transportation sound and light puzzle . Vehicle and animal sounds and lights will be emitted when babies and toddlers put the puzzle in the right place, press the sun to trigger more sound and light effects.

Swimming in the shallow sea. Storytelling in context, practicing oral expression and creativity, practicing shape and pattern correspondence, and increasing the recognition of marine life images and silhouettes, and improving hand-eye coordination.
Finding the punch line - Dinosaurs look this way. Storytelling, oral expression, creativity, shape and pattern matching, animal image and silhouette recognition, hand-eye coordination.

Rainbow Alphabet Puppy. Cute and lively dachshund shape, colorful 26 letters of the alphabet on the back of the button, more can stimulate the learning motivation of infants, in the process of pressing, can train the little finger muscles.
Toaster. Let your infant's imagination run wild as they learn to cook with the interactive Fake Toaster. Lets babies and toddlers learn the three food buttons: numbers, counting and colors.

Little Builders - Gravel Truck Set. The building block game promotes children's development from eye coordination to spatial and numerical skills. Put the sound blocks into the puzzle machine and you can hear the different sounds of each block. Helps with eye coordination and motor development.

Little Builders - Railway Express Highway Set. Putting the sound blocks into the puzzle machine, you can hear the different sounds of each block, promoting the development of eye coordination, spatial and numerical skills, and cultivating concentration.

Stacking Fruit Slicer Trailer. The wooden trailer carries three types of fresh fruit slices. As the months progress, practicing different stacking methods improves hand-eye coordination and hand movement stability, and practicing fine movements also improves concentration and patience.

Fisher-Price Fun Vacuum Cleaner . When the switch is off, if you press the talk button, it turns on a bright light and teaches baby colors and counting through fun songs and chat. If you turn it on and move it around, you can enjoy cleaning games with real sounds!

Colorful wooden blocks. The blocks not only stimulate infants' creativity, but also cultivate their concentration, allowing infants to mix and match to create different combinations and stimulate brain development.

Funky Anxiety Walk. Bubbles of different sizes and colors provide multi-sensory feedback with different pressure and rebound sensations. Enhances finger strength and dexterity. Provides rich visual, auditory and tactile sensations.
The Eagle Forest Band.

Stacking Small Trucks. Finger movement can be improved through twisting or stacking, color differentiation, shape recognition, counting exercises, twisting, fingertip movement, sorting, and other activities can develop comprehension and problem solving skills, the link to the child's self-confidence.

Greedy little squirrel. Press the nose to hear what the squirrel wants to order, different sizes and colors, fruit coins to teach infants to do, learning hand-eye coordination, motor development, visual stimulation, imagination, money concepts, learning to count!

Puzzle Magnetic Building Blocks - Zoo Set. With the theme of zoo, utilizing the characteristics of magnets, adsorbing, arranging and stacking, cultivating the ability of logical thinking. It can promote the development of body senses and enhance cognitive and creative abilities.

Puzzle Magnetic Building Blocks - Duty Cars. Welcome to the world of Duty Cars! Built-in magnets, with bi-directional non-exclusive characteristics, for young children who have not yet developed flexible fingers, easy to operate, with a sense of achievement, in the process of playing blocks, naturally understand the concept of flat combination of three-dimensional concepts.

Wooden animal puzzles. There are six different types of animals to recognize. Place and remove to hear the animal's calls and information about the animal. There are numbers hidden underneath each piece of the puzzle. Puzzles are designed to enhance small muscle development.

Delicate Coffee Maker . Drinking coffee is a relaxing way to unwind, so make your own delicious cup of coffee. With a coffee cup, milk, sugar pot, coffee maker and spoon, toddlers will love this adjustable coffee maker!

LELO DISC. Different from the previous set of circles directly vertical fall, this middle is a spiral way, infants and young children into the circle, will be with the spiral rod rotating slide down, increase the visual experience!
Wooden shape matching storage box. Includes 13 different shapes, triangle, octagon, star, rectangle, square, trapezoid, hexagon, etc. Bright colors to stimulate children's visual senses.
Turtle Stacking Fun. Four adorable turtle shapes for infants to place and move their favorite blocks on. Ideal for learning colors and shapes as well as helping to develop spatial concepts.

Eco Jeep Bowl Station. Colorful animals and geometric shaped blocks help infants and toddlers practice shape correspondence, develop fine motor skills, hand-eye coordination and face recognition. The back of the blocks are decorated with different shapes of particles to increase the tactile stimulation during play.

Key Skewer. Turning, locking and flipping the keys through the game trains infants' hand-eye coordination and the development of small hand muscles; the action of putting the key into the lock hole, repeated practice makes the little hands more flexible!

Black and white magnetic drawing board. Allow infants and young children to give full play to their imagination and creativity in learning, improve hand-eye coordination, auditory training, cute animal silhouette matching cognition, hand doodling training to hold the pen and pen, increase the ability to use the wrist.

Educational fun toolbox. Rich and varied tool table, many cute gadgets, tinkering with infants and toddlers, increase awareness of objects, recognize colors and the names and shapes of various tools, learn the safe use of the tools, and enhance the development of fine hands!

Shape Matching Stacking Tray. Learn basic shapes such as circles, stars, and squares, as well as the recognition of the three primary colors of red, yellow, and blue, and the difference between corresponding color schemes. Use fingertips to match the shapes of the holes to help train hands, fingers and attention.

Bottle Cap Discovery Tray. Turning~Turning~Turning~, different games are hidden under each bottle cap, providing infants and young children with fun visual, tactile and auditory sensory exploration, practicing the flexibility of finger movements such as rotating and pressing, and building up good self-care skills.

Fisher Price Role Play - Coffee Set . Featuring customized coffee beans, a grinder, a coffee pot, and two mugs, this complete set is perfect for preschoolers who want to experience the process of brewing coffee all the time. Realistic sound effects make the game as fun as the real thing!

Visiting medical kits. Infants and toddlers can develop social skills through role-playing. Overcome fear and learn to be brave during the simulation process, so that babies and toddlers are not afraid of going to the doctor for injections!

Children's magnetic drawing board. Allow infants and toddlers to utilize their imagination and creativity in learning, improve hand-eye coordination, shape matching cognition, and training in pencil grip and pen movement through hand-drawing, increasing the ability to use the wrist.

Dinosaur's Dream Park Jigsaw Puzzle. 2, 3, 4 and 5 pieces, gradually increasing the difficulty level, step by step to build up the puzzle experience. Large size is easy for baby to hold and handle, enhancing fine motor skills and hand-eye coordination.
Vegetable Cutting Puzzle Board . Various ways for baby to explore the world of vegetables, learn about vegetables and colors, and also train the development of small hand muscles.

Multi-Combination Magnetic Stick . Suitable for infants and young children's hand size, and further develop better grasping ability, so that the hands and brain synchronized connection, from 2D to 3D space development quickly. There are no positive or negative poles, so there is no obstacle when playing, and you can convert imagination into reality.

Spinning Circle Chorus Farm. Press the fly DJ to pause or change the song, there are 5 songs to change, promote hand-eye coordination and sensory development. Put down the corresponding animal to start the music, rotate the gears to continue the music.
Animal Bounce. Infants and toddlers can learn to match animals to help develop motor skills, shape and color recognition and matching, spatial relationships, and imagination.
Hape Rainbow Tap Stick Table . The colorful stick table allows children to learn colors and numbers. Use the hammer to knock down the colored pegs, then flip it over and start again!

Little Hands Training Treasure Chest - Animals . A cute cloth book to nurture your child's grasping ability and carry with you. The soft voice soothes children's emotions, and includes many intellectual development, such as math and logic, with educational meaning and soothing effect.

Bunny Activity Book . Increase finger strength and fine-motor skills by practicing skills such as zippers, buckles and lanyards. Promotes cognitive development and imagination: its engaging, interactive activities encourage children to explore, experiment and solve problems
Classified car building blocks. Learning about garbage sorting and recycling blocks, learning about color recognition develops children's imagination and manual dexterity.

Rolling blocks fire engine . Put the blocks into the main machine, it will send out voice to tell the letters and words, when the ladder adjusts the height, the blocks will also keep turning, small objects that can be turned, can train infants and young children's grip strength and the cognition of the direction in which to go!

Puzzle building blocks for beginners. Simple shapes train finger dexterity, cultivate children's ability to solve problems patiently, enhance concentration, realize potential and creativity. Cultivate the ability to recognize shapes and sizes to stimulate your imagination.
String Car. Ideal for storytelling, counting, color recognition and object recognition, stringing can develop children's concentration and little finger dexterity.

Interact with the scales in a circle. Learn the concepts of size recognition, stacking and balancing. When the left and right sides are balanced, you will hear encouraging sound effects and phrases. Train hand-eye coordination and grip strength. Different color patterns stimulate tactile development.

Shaped key box. Use the key to open the corresponding color door. The transparent ⑤ compartment not only increases the versatility of the game, but also makes learning more fun. Combine the three basic cognition of quantity, color and shape to increase hand-eye coordination and fine hand movements.

Magnetic Building Blocks - 1 year old building blocks. Built-in magnets, with bi-directional non-rejection characteristics, for 1-year-old children who have not yet developed flexible fingers, easy to operate, with a sense of achievement, through play to stimulate the brain, feel the endless fun of assembly!

Puzzle Fun Ball. It is a ball that can stimulate the imagination and creativity of infants and young children, with different bright colors to stimulate the visual development of infants and young children and induce curiosity, while also training infants and young children in hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills.

Black Bear's Shape Matching Truck. Put different shapes of puzzle pieces in the container truck and embed them into the corresponding shapes. Press the yellow button at the front of the truck and the container will tilt down to pour out the shapes! Trains concentration, shape recognition and small hand muscles.

Little Face Expressions. Learn about shapes, colors and matching to help infants develop their small muscles, practice hand-eye coordination, and improve fine motor skills and agility. Learning about characters and their emotional awareness

3 pieces connect the animals that are easy to understand, and match the correct animal according to the pattern, color and shape, to enhance children's thinking logic, hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills.
My Happy Farm. There are a variety of ways to play, know the animals, threading, shapes, play games, during the process of infants can learn about shapes, colors, space, etc.
Green Town Building Blocks . Charge and run through the car in a playful game that not only builds socialization and emotion, but also develops manual dexterity, grasping and stacking!

Colorful Rolling Ball Building Block Set. Cultivate concentration, frustration tolerance and patience when assembling track parts. It allows children to brainstorm and build creatively, with a variety of shapes of blocks and unlimited combinations.

Angle Cone Stacking. Ten colors, from the size and shape of the tiles, arrangement and combination, symmetry and balance, number understanding and direction and position of the spatial concepts. To develop the stability and control of small hand muscles, color recognition and discrimination, establish number concepts and enhance creativity.

Tropical Magnet Fishing Set. Includes two fishing rods, just point at the fish's magnetic clasps, you can successfully catch it; also can have a two-player competition to see who can catch the most fish! Trains hand dexterity, problem solving skills and patience.

Forest touch three-dimensional puzzles. The six animals can be put together according to the colors and patterns, and at the same time, develops the child's hand-eye coordination and cognitive skills. Thick, large pieces make it easy for baby to grip and help develop hand muscles.
Star Goldfish. Help the goldfish dress up with color stars to recognize 5 colors and learn basic motor skills such as hand-eye coordination and hand strength.

Delicious Breakfast Set . Satisfy your baby's role-playing desires. Breakfast is the most important of the three meals, so let's make a nutritious breakfast with your little hands. Develop curiosity and life skills, suitable for parents and children to play together!

Cyclone Tumbling Tower . Discover how the mechanism works and find out how to repeat the game. Rolling improves visual tracking and concentration. Improves hand-eye coordination. Stimulates curiosity and desire to explore.
Vintage cash register. Realistic cash register to help children become more immersed in the simulation. Features coins, bells and a mobile cash drawer. Teaches children about money and motor skills.
Animal Stringing. Animals and the understanding of objects, stringing can develop children's concentration and dexterity of small fingers, fine movements, hand-eye coordination

Animal Shape Sorting House. Children can learn colors and shapes by placing blocks in the correctly shaped holes. Twisting the knocking sound on the door builds fine motor skills such as hand strength. The cabin and blocks allow parents to tell stories to their children.

Spinning Gear Construction - Baby Ocean . The chunky, thick gears snap into place easily and help children develop fine motor skills to keep the gears moving! It also introduces infants to the animals in the ocean!

100 Word Animal Interactive Cognitive Chart. The book-like design with flaps, press the picture to hear the sound of the word, allowing infants to recognize the animal's call, word and appearance through pictures and sounds.
The 26 letters of the alphabet come with four different modes of play for infants and toddlers, and some of the buttons make sounds just like a car!

The steering wheel is a multiway steering wheel. Press the music wheel button to listen to three light-hearted songs and operate the gear lever to move the car forward, stop or reverse. Turn left, go right, LED directional lights with realistic sound and light, babies and toddlers are just like little drivers!

Rainbow Geometry Stacking Fun. Practice placing circles and polygons in the right place. In this process of repeated play, it can promote hand-eye coordination, enhance visual recognition, build up logical thinking, and give full play to imagination and spatial sense.

Furry Kids Pet Clinic . Children love role-playing, where animals live, matching colors and key shapes, wrist (finger) turning and pulling ability, educating the concept of animal care, and also cultivating spatial awareness (up, down, left, right, 1st floor, 2nd floor) memory training.

Puzzle Fun Puzzle Dice. Put together 8 blocks to form a complete dice to train body coordination and stimulate potential. Through the construction of colorful dice, it develops motor skills and concentration, as well as three-dimensional spatial concepts and logical thinking.

Shape Stacking Box. It allows children to recognize numbers and shapes, practice fine finger movements, cultivate stability and patience, and establish the concept of object constancy and space. Can help small muscle development and hand-eye coordination training.

Practicing Barista. It allows children to utilize their imagination, improve their speech, do simple math addition and subtraction calculations, manipulate machines to exercise their hand muscles, and develop their auditory and visual senses.

Bunny Magic Box. Above/below, left/right, inside/outside, see/hide, guides toddlers to observe and learn spatial terms. Matching with the game cards, children can build up visual and spatial concepts in the challenge.

City Adventure - Fire Truck. Multiple ways to use the ladder to increase the fun of the game. Role-playing situation toys guide children's rich imagination and create stories, allowing children to learn interpersonal relationships and oral expression through play.

Tupitu Music Fat Card . Cultivate infants' auditory and visual development, shape matching exercise. Operation mechanism can help to exercise small hand muscles, role-playing to utilize the imagination, and can be combined with a story to practice oral expression.

Flock plays along with the electronic drums. Developing a sense of rhythm not only increases a child's musical sensibility, but also helps with the balance, coordination and rhythm needed for walking and movement, as well as language comprehension.

Show Your Hand Bowling . The perfect first bowling exercise to help toddlers develop motor skills and develop spatial awareness. This is also the perfect toy to teach toddlers how to play together and take turns!

Stacking Ice Cream Truck. Children can learn color and cognitive development, manipulate the mechanism to exercise the small hand muscles, role-play to give full play to the imagination, and combine with the story situation to practice oral expression. Lets toddlers fulfill their role-playing preferences.

The Kingdom of Circles set. Trains hand-eye coordination and concentration, stimulates the use of finger joints and visual nerve development. At the same time, it establishes the concepts of quantity and color and stimulates children's logical thinking, imagination and creativity.
Crane Train Track Set. This is a train track set that promotes the full development of sight and touch in infants and children, and the train carries cargo that can be lifted by a crane.

Puzzle Circle Tower . A 35-item play guide created through multifaceted feedback from the kindergarten classroom! Advanced game play according to age groups. A classic toy that can be used with toddlers for a long time, with a safe design! Safe for toddlers to use!

Builder's Toolbox. Role-playing to satisfy children's imagination and train hand-eye coordination and large and small muscle development in the process of assembling. Learning the fun of handling tools and developing daily life experience.

Sweet Honey Frosting Set . Ice cream to cool down the summer heat! Children can satisfy their role-playing preferences and learn life knowledge, interpersonal relationships, and pairing exercises while playing, which in turn promotes the development of the brain and small muscles.

Fishing is fun. When adding magnets into the fishing game, it adds adhesion to the game. The wiggling fish line requires hand stability, so be careful not to collide with each other to avoid falling fish! Increase children's hand-eye coordination, number concept and concentration.

Fun Cyclone Wok Set. The simulated stovetop and wok allow chefs to show off their skills. The stovetop is equipped with an internal fan, and the airflow through the bottom of the wok will make the food shake up and down, and when stir-frying, it is as if the ingredients are really bubbling on the wok, which simulates a real cooking scenario.

Stacking Parking Garage. The wooden stacking garage has 10 brightly colored carts, each with a different color and a small handle design to promote hand-eye coordination and fine hand movement development. Children can learn to count, stack and arrange, and distinguish colors in the game.

Construction Vehicles. Indispensable helpers in construction projects, each with different functions, including (road roller, cement mixer, forklift, crane and hoist, etc.), a total of 7 Happy Construction Vehicles. Stimulate children's imagination and creativity while having fun!
Mane 80 Building Blocks. The colorful bristle blocks help children recognize color and touch, develop creativity, hand-eye coordination and spatial planning concepts.

Sunshine Valley 3D Maze . Use the magnet in the bird's beak to attract colorful beads and transport them to the slides and other play equipment. Fun design with various mechanisms to enhance concentration.

Triangle Tangrams . Wooden puzzle pieces of different shapes and sizes are used to create a variety of shapes. In order to familiarize children with the shapes through play. Enhance the dexterity of hands and fingers, extend thinking and concentration.

Vegetable Soup Set . A very realistic toy set. Let's cook the vegetables in a pot and finish them in a bowl. By imitating making soup, this could be a step towards overcoming your child's aversion to vegetables!
Baking Mixer. Make delicious biscuits~Pour the ingredients into the bowl, adjust the mixing speed, simulate the baking situation, rotate the mixer to train the development of small muscles!

Memory Fish Test . Take turns to pick up two small fishes, find out the pair of patterns in the memory, and collect the small fishes if you match them successfully. Trains memory, response and concentration skills.

Bunny's Pillow Fight . It is an arm stretching exercise that requires the coordinated use of the arm and wrist swings to help children develop their large arm muscles. Hand-eye coordination and spatial awareness are needed to hit the target.

Magnetic Rollerball Maze - Engineering Car . Basic penmanship practice through different track designs. Familiarize yourself with the concept of number and quantity through counting. Improve hand stability and hand-eye coordination.

Baby Puzzle Cards - Animal Friends . Puzzle templates guide toddlers to find the corresponding puzzle pieces. After practicing, the templates can be removed and the puzzle can be put together freely. Promotes fine-motor skills, attention and observation.

Touch Piano Set. Pressing the keyboard and buttons makes sounds and lights, and your child's curiosity is heightened. Use your fingers to play and read music at the same time, making full use of your brain.

Variety Tower. Stacking and embedding, the hexagonal blocks are easy to stack or embed in a flat surface; and the increase in the number of edges allows for a wider variety of shapes and a more three-dimensional feel.

Instant Food Set . A very realistic toy set. Take your baby to experience the fun of play, know the ingredients, make meals, can develop curiosity and life skills, is and parents and children with fun!

Animal counting. You can point out the shapes, colors, and animals, and also turn the dial to get the right one, and you can think and distinguish different shapes when you touch them, which further deepens the learning impression and improves your observation and concentration at the same time.
Rainbow Bus Toy . Featuring 12 songs and sounds and filled with colorful features, hop on and enjoy the ride. Open the drop-down backrest and the imaginative play begins!

Digital Mini Vehicle. Miniature vehicles, each with numbers and colors, infants can learn color and number recognition while having fun, and at the same time can train hand-eye coordination and small hand muscle development.

Electric Cooker Cooking Set . Play dress-up with this electric cooker and let the kids experience the fun of cooking and eating! You can put the rice in a bowl and put your favorite side dishes on the plate! Playing role-play with your child can promote communication and coordination, as well as enhance parent-child interaction!
Mushroom Nail Assembly Kit. Play and learn at the same time. Containing 4 colors of large pieces, through the combination of colors, stimulate children's creativity!
Wooden Juicer. A juicer to learn about fruits, let babies and toddlers use their imagination to cut up fruits and put them into the juicer to turn them into nutritious and delicious juices.

Nature Scene Stacking Blocks . Encourage children to create their own forests, mountains and meadows using rainbow shapes and animal blocks. The equal sized blocks enhance finger dexterity and fine motor skill development. Stimulates imagination, creativity and problem solving skills.

Wooden transportation car set. Learning color recognition, arranging trains and cars, learning spatial recognition, creating original stories to play with imagination, imitating sounds, enriching language and expression skills, practicing balance and hand-eye coordination through moving toys.

Wooden Puzzle-123. Repeatedly practicing, observing the shapes, comparing the number of dots and the relationship between the numbers, the process of playing can be learned at the same time numbers and colors and a variety of ways to play!

Forest Wood Piano. With easy note sheet music, let your child become a little musician! Introduce your child to the wonders of music. You can also use the stick to play with the steel piano on the top.

Spin the cash register. Participate in role-playing, like a real money game. Playing while adding and subtracting makes learning even more fun. Press the number buttons to learn numbers and quantities to stimulate thinking and interaction!

Portable City Transportation Set. Hand-held city transportation set with 4 wooden vehicles and 14 common road traffic signs and buildings, training children's hand-eye coordination and small hand muscles, enriching children's knowledge of daily life objects.

Wooden double-layer elevating transporter. Includes four colorful cars that can be mounted on the transporter, the front of the transporter with a linkage device, can be freely matched with the outside, so that children through the toy, in the world of imagination to experience the fun of dress up!

Locking game board. Contains 6 different types of switches, such as: door latch, chain, hook and loop, etc., allowing children to repeat the process of opening and closing the door, increasing a series of hand-eye coordination, the development of fine motor skills and dexterity of the small hands

Small banjo. The sound is strummed, the tone is crisp and clear, high tenacity strings are safe and do not hurt your hands, and the tuning knobs are in the shape of birds, adding fun. Train children's hand-eye coordination and small hand muscles.

Treasure Island Tales. A favorite role-playing game for toddlers, where fierce pirates return home with treasure and octopus victories, only to be carried away by the winds and currents to a faraway unknown island, and learn to enrich their imaginations!

Animal Locking Board. There are three different types of switches, allowing children to increase hand-eye coordination and develop fine motor skills and dexterity in the process of repeated switching.

Animal Dressing Board. Children can familiarize themselves with the techniques of tying shoelaces, seat belts and leather straps by feeling, manipulating and practicing with their hands. Through a variety of repetitive games, they can improve hand-eye coordination, develop fine motor skills and dexterity of small hands.

Fish catching game. There are 9 fishes of 3 different lengths, use the fishing rod to catch the fishes, with a tape measure to compare the length of the fishes caught. Train hand-eye coordination and visual development
Delicious sushi table. Experience the fun of sushi making with role-play games where children can play the roles of sushi chef and customers. Use wooden chopsticks to improve hand-eye coordination.

The little pastry master. If you turn the tray upside down, it can be used as a cutting board. In addition to practicing slicing and dicing, children can also make bread by changing the ingredients. The variety of food cultivates children's imagination and trains their practical skills.

Numeric Learning Locks . Each lock has a matching key, and both the lock and key have corresponding numbers and dots. Stimulates a sense of challenge, develops practical skills, improves resilience and perseverance, and enhances fine motor skills.

Thick Piece Puzzle - Four Seasons. Cute girl enjoys the changes brought about by the four seasons, 6, 9, 12, 16 pieces respectively, gradually increasing the difficulty level, effectively improving the ability to put together puzzles, and cultivating the ability of observation, concentration, persistence, and logic in order.

Thick Piece Jigsaw Puzzle - Beautiful Garden. The garden is full of colorful flowers, vegetables and fruit trees, and there are bees and butterflies in the garden, you can ask children to describe what they see, which can train children's language skills and observation.

Puzzle Beads. Use 12 different types of stringing beads to form a variety of puzzles. The book contains 109 puzzles, with beginner level puzzles that can be practiced at a younger age, and more difficult triangular and pyramid puzzles at a later stage!

Three Little Pigs. Comes with a picture storybook, combining story reading and fun games. Fairy tale and cute character design make it easy for children to understand the rules of the game. Enhances visual and spatial concepts and problem solving skills.

Cute Metro Car Jigsaw Puzzle. Puzzles are essential educational toys for toddlers. Through the practice of disassembling and reassembling, it can enhance toddlers' logic, hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills. It also helps to train children to be stress-resistant!

My First Toolbox. With a variety of small props in the toolbox, the construction of the assembly allows children to practice the use of eyes and hands, which is very useful for the training of delicate hand movements, learning the basic principles of engineering.

Carrot Trap . Carrots keep growing and Bonnie Bunny is trapped, come and save her! Pull out the corresponding carrot according to the color of the dice, so that children can increase their ability to recognize the same color and learn the ability to wait and take turns.

Creative path. The rules are varied and the topics are rich and diverse, from easy to difficult to gradually stimulate the creativity of young children's logical thinking and the ability to use their hands, and can train young children's patience, concentration, creativity and thinking is suitable for parents and children to think and play together.

EQ Pineapple Friend. Life is full of all kinds of happy and sad emotions, move your little hands with the pineapple friend, together with the learning of emotional expression and awareness! Trains hand grip muscles and improves hand-eye coordination.
Harken Puzzle Vehicles . Picture book-like puzzles that show how the vehicle moves, what happens inside, and how the vehicle works. Develops observation, concentration, persistence, and logic.
Super Fruit Pie. Toddler games using special clips to exercise small hand muscles, learn colors and fruit classification, with cards to learn basic math!

Rotating Gear Construction Set. Through the hands-on assembly process, not only can it enhance hand-eye coordination and fine motor movements, but also children can learn about the rotation of gears and the principle of interlocking linkage.
Burger Sandwich Kit. There are many ways to play with your favorite toppings, or follow the picture cards to make a delicious meal!

You're Up, I'm Down. Help children to familiarize with spatial orientation recognition through interesting scene cards. Helps children to learn left/right, front/back, side orientation and strengthen the concept of spatial logic.

Stacking Tower. Use the dice to determine where to place your acrobats, place the circular base plates, and as the stacks get higher and higher, the thrill level goes through the roof. Train your concentration and cognitive skills.

Crocodile socks are missing. The crocodiles have lost their socks! Help them to find the right socks from the pile. This is a quick matching game, use the cute little suction handle to suck the correct socks quickly. Train graphic response and recognition skills!

Chef's Wok. Chef's Fry Shop is now open! The combination of wooden accessories and non-woven fabric gives children a different tactile experience, and turning the outer box is a gas stove, which is good for storage. Role-playing games train children's expression and interpersonal interaction.

Motorized construction group. Give full play to creativity, make your own original works, young children are in the dexterity of the rapid development period, at the same time, this is also the time when the child's imagination is greatly developed, so that children in the fun at the same time to encourage hand-eye coordination and creativity, can be correctly pick up and move small objects!
MathLink Cubes. By connecting numbers to the classic mathlink cubes, toddlers can build their own number blocks from one to ten and train their little hand muscles to manipulate them!

Mushroom picking and bug catching game. The woodpecker with a magnet will easily suck up the colorful insects, different sizes of mushrooms into the corresponding holes, the game trains infants and young children hand-eye coordination, small hand muscle strength

Toddler learning alarm clock. Differentiate the hour hand and minute hand by color, red represents the hour hand and blue represents the minute hand. You can first use the red hour hand to let your child read the corresponding numbers to learn the hour. Then, repeat the above method with the blue minute hand to learn minutes.

Turn, turn, turn! Learn to read the clock. Learn to read the clock by turning the hands freely to develop the concept of time. As you become more familiar with the clock, you can add an advanced cover plate to make the clock dial more like the general time.

Cool B. Music Symphony Orchestra. 13 instruments with 15 pre-recorded songs. Let your child learn to distinguish the tone and shape of each instrument, learn to recognize colors, and train their grip by putting the instruments into the pool to play.
English Tablet. Learn the basics of English through the tablet, with switchable learning mode and question mode, and 75 questions in question mode to develop basic skills naturally through play.

The squirrel's battle for the acorns. Various themes to choose from, including elementary addition and subtraction, graphic color recognition. Fun gameplay, training baby's concentration and memory, and gripper to train baby's fine hand movements.

Comprehensive Noodle Cooking Set . Enjoy a variety of noodle dishes and practice using chopsticks and forks! Role-play to develop your imagination, practice hand-eye coordination, and learn more about colors. Learn about daily life from the game!
Engineering Transportation Vehicle. Let your child have fun while encouraging hand-eye coordination and creativity, and picking up and moving small objects correctly.

Delicious udon noodle dish combination. Enjoy noodle dishes and practice using chopsticks! Role play to develop imagination, language and social skills. Practice hand-eye coordination and learn more about colors. Learn about everyday life from the game!

Puzzle Tower. It contains 74 questions in 3 levels, the higher the level, the more difficult it is, even for adults, it is a challenge and the brain is activated in the process of playing. In the game challenge, you can learn graphic cognition, spatial concepts, theoretical thinking, concentration, and other skills.

Creative String Building Blocks. A new type of string building block that uses a combination of blocks and strings to change, you can enjoy a variety of ways to play with the special string changes and the many types of blocks. Learn to think and move through the game, learn to think and move through the game.

String Apple . The apple blocks and bugs can be stacked in multiple angles to promote hand stability and spatial construction skills. Unique threading bugs, through the practice of threading and knotting, to enhance the fine finger movement skills.

Four Seasons. From left to right, the four seasons are delicately described, spring flowers, summer outing, autumn maple red, winter snow, letting children understand the change of seasons, and develop concentration, logical thinking, memory and response in the process of puzzles.

Egg Defense. Slide the transparent panel up and down to protect all the eggs. Challenge from shallow to deep. In the process of playing the game, you can improve your logical thinking and spatial concepts, and enhance your high-level strategic thinking ability.

Apple Bite. Cute apples and colorful caterpillars, the apple game board is divided into five parts, which can be flipped forward and backward by the center axis, with a rotating and twisting caterpillar to increase the challenge and changes. Enhances logical thinking and planning skills

Logic Labyrinth. Logic Maze is a puzzle game that utilizes track tiles to design a rolling route so that the ball can complete the end point smoothly. There are only two types of puzzles, "Straight" and "Horizontal", to cultivate logical thinking and concentration.

Ice Cream Frenzy . Children stack the same ice cream in the order of the question cards, and be careful not to let the ice cream fall down! Don't let the ice cream fall down, it can train hand-eye coordination, concentration and patience, graphic correspondence and other skills.

Color Code . 18 color palettes of different styles and colors, and a specially designed game table. Stack the tiles in different ways on the game table to create a variety of geometric shapes. Improves visual recognition, strategic planning and concentration.

XO Arrangement Challenge: 120 levels, five levels of challenge, from shallow to deep, to challenge the limits of brain power. Enhance image observation, cultivate situational imagination, develop logical reasoning, strengthen patience and concentration, and promote spatial and directional skills.

Frame Crisis. A logic and pattern recognition speed race with four levels of difficulty and the fastest person to correctly place the correct picture on the card wins! Trains fine motor and spatial concepts.

Rainbow Action. Logical pattern recognition speed game, arc design, difficulty increases, and combines flat and three-dimensional arrangement, more test baby's concentration and stability! Improves hand-eye coordination and builds small muscles.

Cubes Mission. Place the cubes of different lengths on the correct position, the position of the cubes must match the color of the "colored dots" and "colored blocks" in the question card to be considered successful. Trains observation and logical judgment, improves color response and spatial recognition.

Animal Parade Jigsaw Puzzle. The little ants lead a magnificent procession and set off for the parade! The size of the puzzle pieces is relatively large, and the total length is about 133 centimeters after completion. The irregular shapes of the pieces give the puzzle more variations, which not only breaks the tradition of square puzzle size, but also promotes children's thinking and brings more stimulation!

Human Body Puzzle . Learn about your body together! Follow the instructions on the poster to complete the puzzle patiently and place the blocks of organs and muscles in the correct position to learn about the human body's bones, muscles, organs and so on!

Beans on Stilts. Set up the balance board on the base, according to the location of the card corresponding to the placement of red beans, and then all the designated beans on the stilts, when the stilts are balanced, it will pass the hurdle!

Skate Park Architect. Learn about the engineering design process step by step with task cards and planners to stimulate children's thinking, develop logic, improve hand-eye coordination, construct assembly concepts, and enhance problem-solving skills.
